title: how do you post pictures in the boards
body:
so you can see them on your post , not a website u have to click 

thx

test:::

http://imgur.com/a/FBaGl

replies.body: While there currently isn't an attachment feature, you can still use sources like imgur to post images.  The boards will automatically format them to have it appear in your posts.  There's also a great [Boards Formatting](http://boards.na.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/miscellaneous/YHPBc6k3-board-formatting-101) guide to help breakdown and format your posts into a beautiful work of art!
